headline: U.S. Government Backs Constellation’s Plan to Launch Crane Clean Energy Center, Adding 835 MWs of New Baseload Power to the Grid
summary: LONDONDERRY, Pa., November 18, 2025--Constellation announced today that its Crane Clean Energy Center is now backed by a $1 billion U.S. Department of Energy (DOE) loan.

content.title: U.S. Government Backs Constellation’s Plan to Launch Crane Clean Energy Center, Adding 835 MWs of New Baseload Power to the Grid
content.summary: LONDONDERRY, Pa., November 18, 2025--Constellation announced today that its Crane Clean Energy Center is now backed by a $1 billion U.S. Department of Energy (DOE) loan.

headline: U.S. Backs $1 Billion Loan to Restart the Three Mile Island Nuclear Plant
summary: The Trump Administration will give  Constellation Energy  a $1 billion federal loan to restart the Three Mile Island nuclear power plant in Pennsylvania that suffered a partial core meltdown in 1979.  Energy Secretary  Chris Wright  said Tuesday that restarting the plant will help bring down electricity prices and that the administration will act to bring more nuclear generation online.  Constellation announced last year that it would restart the Three Mile Island site of the country’s worst nuclear power accident, to help generate electricity for  Microsoft  which needs more power to fuel its artificial intelligence business.

content.title: U.S. Backs $1 Billion Loan to Restart the Three Mile Island Nuclear Plant
content.summary: The Trump Administration will give  Constellation Energy  a $1 billion federal loan to restart the Three Mile Island nuclear power plant in Pennsylvania that suffered a partial core meltdown in 1979.  Energy Secretary  Chris Wright  said Tuesday that restarting the plant will help bring down electricity prices and that the administration will act to bring more nuclear generation online.  Constellation announced last year that it would restart the Three Mile Island site of the country’s worst nuclear power accident, to help generate electricity for  Microsoft  which needs more power to fuel its artificial intelligence business.

headline: Energy Department loans $1B to help finance the restart of nuclear reactor on Three Mile Island
summary: The U.S. Department of Energy said Tuesday that it will loan $1 billion to help finance the restart of the nuclear power plant on Pennsylvania's Three Mile Island that is under contract to supply power to data centers for tech giant Microsoft.  The loan is in line with the priorities of President Donald Trump's administration, including bolstering nuclear power and artificial intelligence.  For Constellation Energy, which owns Three Mile Island's lone functioning nuclear power reactor, the federal loan will lower its financing cost to get the mothballed plant up and running again.

content.title: Energy Department loans $1B to help finance the restart of nuclear reactor on Three Mile Island
content.summary: The U.S. Department of Energy said Tuesday that it will loan $1 billion to help finance the restart of the nuclear power plant on Pennsylvania's Three Mile Island that is under contract to supply power to data centers for tech giant Microsoft.  The loan is in line with the priorities of President Donald Trump's administration, including bolstering nuclear power and artificial intelligence.  For Constellation Energy, which owns Three Mile Island's lone functioning nuclear power reactor, the federal loan will lower its financing cost to get the mothballed plant up and running again.

thumbnail.caption: FILE - At Constellation's nuclear power plant on Three Mile Island, called the Crane Clean Energy Center, near Middletown, Pa., the cooling towers are reflected in the Susquehanna River at sunrise, June 25, 2025. (AP Photo/Ted Shaffrey, File)

headline: Nuclear Energy Earnings: Which Names Won and Lost in Q3
summary: Several key nuclear stocks recently reported Q3 earnings. See how markets reacted to the results of NuScale Power, Constellation Energy, and Oklo.
